name: obsidian-smart-connections
description: Link and chat with your notes using ChatGPT and embedding artificial intelligence from OpenAI.

scripts.update-manifest-version: jq '.version = $newVersion' --arg newVersion $(jq -r '.version' package.json) manifest.json > manifest.json.tmp && mv manifest.json.tmp manifest.json
scripts.build: npm version patch && npm run bundle && npm run copy-style-to-dist && npm run update-manifest-version && npm run copy-to-obs
